original_text: Eli asked Samuel, ‘What message did the Lord speak to you? You must not hide it from me. God will certainly punish you if you do not tell me everything that he said to you.’
korean_text: 이르되 네게 무엇을 말씀하셨느냐 청하노니 내게 숨기지 말라 네게 말씀하신 모든 것을 하나라도 숨기면 하나님이 네게 벌을 내리시고 또 내리시기를 원하노라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: What message did the Lord speak to you?
You must not hide it from me.
if you do not tell me everything
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 모든 것을 내게 말하지 않으면
